provenanceData.sentence: Not trying to be critical of you in any way, but with regard to your purchase of the mailers, how many years ago are we talking about?
Years ago I bought a batch of prepaid Fuji processing mailers.
Having taken my money when I bought mailers, and having rendered their own mailers worthless by fiat, Fuji now refuses to give any kind of refund or even a token discount.
